Object.Name: Notecard
Object.Description:
Added command/flaw cards for Lando/Kallus.

Removed the "flaw cards" bag in the top right corner; flaw cards are now a mandatory (but manual) upgrade card per hero that has one (or you can spawn manually with "Spawn Decks").

Changed the list builder: command cards and contingencies are now picked through the command card picker; can pick >= 6.
